title: What is the font used by the Sydney Theatre Company ?
content:
Hello everybody !

I'm trying to identify this font for a week now. I tryed WhatTheFont?! and identifont but with no positive match. Thanx for helping ;-)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011100810im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font_4428.png)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font2.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011100810/http:/typophile.com/files/font2_0.png) | 16.17 KB |
author: th.koutsaft

comments.content:
thanx a lot for your answer.  
it was odile upright italic (just saying that to be more specific)  
thanx again ;-)
